entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:02 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning near noon then changing to flurries at times heavy early this afternoon and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 2.
